Summary: San Francisco Bay Coffee Fog Chaser One Cup for Keurig K-Cup Brewers
text: San Francisco Bay Coffee Fog Chaser One Cup for Keurig K-Cup Brewers is a very nice complement to the Keurig Green Mountain selections.  I am now on my computer with a nice hot cup of the Fog Chaser at my side. I like the fact that there are eight cups to an air tight bag, and that there is an external plastic container for storage after you open one of these bags. A very nice option which I will again use for future purchases.
